titleStmt.title: The poet's ramble after riches. With Reflections upon a country corporation. Also The author's lamentation in the time of adversity. / By the author of The trip to Jamaica.
titleStmt.author: Ward, Edward, 1667-1731.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by J. How, in the Ram-Head-Inn-Yard, in Fenchurch-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library.
